mapper.select: select id, purchase_id, created_at, is_deleted, is_completed from nthing.chat_room;
mapper.insert: insert into nthing.chat_room (purchase_id, created_at, is_deleted, is_completed) values #{purchaseId}, now(), default, default
insert into nthing.chat_message (sender, message, sent_at, chat_room_id) values (#{sender}, #{message}, now(), #{chatRoomId})
insert into nthing.chat_room_user (user_id, chat_room_id, joined_at, left_at) values (#{userId}, #{id}, now(), default) on duplicate key update joined_at = now();
